Class MyMouseListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • MyMouseListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener, java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.event.MouseInputListener

    public class MyMouseListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.swing.event.MouseInputListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener
    MyMouseListener: This class will handle mouse events.
    Author:
    Artem, Anthony
